description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nZantai's Reign:
At the start of battle, this creature gains [icons,1980]Mega Magic. Your creatures' [icons,1980]Mega Magic now increases your creatures' stats equal to 15% of the damage dealt.
name: Jewel of Zantai (Magenta)
